title: Dubinik® Mens Flannel Shirt Long Sleeve Button Down Plaid All Cotton Soft Brushed Flannel Shirt for Men Utility Casual Shirt
description: 【Warm tips】Dubinik mens flannel shirt mens flannel jacket mens plaid shirts long sleeve conform to US size, please refer to the size chart before buying, if you like a little looser, perhaps you can buy a size larger. Have any questions, please feel free to contact us and we will try our best to solve it for you.

【Fabric】Made of brushed fannel all cotton, making this mens flannel soft, comfortable and warm. And each shirt is pre-shrunk and pre-dyed, so you don't have to worry about faded or distort. Machine washable or hand washable. Everyday wear can be worn ironless.

【Utility design】Contrasting corduroy lined cuffs and collar prevents shirt deformation and enhances durability. Two buttons on the cuffs for easy adjustment. Two chest pockets with button closures, left chest pocket with pencil slot，easy to store. Shirt back design with hanging ring. Dubinik mens button down long sleeve shirts with pockets is very practical and durable, and will be your best choice of shirts for the fall and winter.

【Classic style】Dubinik flannel shirt for men buffalo plaid vintage lightweight flannel consist of vertical and horizontal bands in two or more colors, classic plaid pattern. Available in a variety of classic colors: tan, black, rust, green, christmas red, navy, baby blue, orange, khaki, etc.

【Suitable occasion】Stylish design, perfect for Casual/Business/Work/Club/Wedding/Show/Party/Concert/Hiking/Halloween/Christmas/Thanksgiving. Best gift for families, husband, friends or boyfriend. Dubinik mens shirts can be flannel jackets for men, as a thin coat, or a holiday shirt, a work shirt, a worker shirt, an outdoor shirt.
